name: Adol Mantid
content:
Adol Mantid was a Human male Imperial Officer who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin, Mantid was assigned to the planet Dathomir when an accident took place in the Imperial Research and Prison Facility. Ool Awmod fell victim to the Blackwing virus, and turned into an undead manifestation. His undead body was controlled by the virus and kept walking around in the Quarantine Zone until it was destroyed by a spacer.
Adol Mantid was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Adol Mantid was added to the game with the "Game Update 14", released on October 12, 2009. He was one of the Undead boss enemies in the Quarantine Zone that players have to kill to complete a collection.
